languages.text: Наместник Владайм, следуя тайной присяге, данной Вольному Торговцу, исподволь развращал станцию. Во время реставрации великолепной статуи Бога-Императора его мастера внесли невидные глазу изменения в конструкцию. Однако астропаты спустя годы стали отмечать, как сильно меркнет свет Астрономикона подле Футфола.

Liege Tocara, under a secret oath of loyalty to the Rogue Trader, slowly but surely corrupted the station. During the restoration of the magnificent statue of the God-Emperor, his craftsmen introduced faults in the structure that were invisible to the naked eye. Yet, years later, Astropaths noticed that the light of the Astronomican was greatly dimmed around Footfall.
languages.original_text: Наместник Владайм, следуя тайной присяге, данной Вольному Торговцу, исподволь развращал станцию. Во время реставрации великолепной статуи Бога-Императора его мастера внесли невидные глазу изменения в конструкцию. Однако астропаты спустя годы стали отмечать, как сильно меркнет свет Астрономикона подле Футфола.

traits.locale_text: Liege Vladaym, under a secret oath of loyalty to the Rogue Trader, slowly and surely corrupted the station. During the restoration of the magnificent statue of the God-Emperor, his craftsmen made changes to the structure, unseen by the naked eye. Yet, Astropaths years later noticed that the light of the Astronomican dims greatly around Footfall.

Liege Vladaym, under a secret oath of loyalty to the Rogue Trader, slowly and surely corrupted the station. During the restoration of the magnificent statue of the God-Emperor, his craftsmen made changes to the structure, unseen by the naked eye. Yet, Astropaths years later noticed that the light of the Astronomican dims greatly around Footfall.

During the restoration of the magnificent statue of the God-Emperor, his craftsmen made faults in the structure invisible to the naked eye. Yet, years later, Astropaths noticed that the light of the Astronomican was greatly dimmed around Footfall.

During the restoration of the magnificent statue of the God-Emperor, his craftsmen made faults in the structure invisible to the naked eye. Yet, years later, Astropaths noticed that the light of the Astronomican was greatly dimmed around Footfall.

Liege Tocara, under a secret oath of loyalty to the Rogue Trader, slowly but surely corrupted the station. During the restoration of the magnificent statue of the God-Emperor, his craftsmen introduced faults in the structure that were invisible to the naked eye. Yet, years later, Astropaths noticed that the light of the Astronomican was greatly dimmed around Footfall.

Liege Tocara, under a secret oath of loyalty to the Rogue Trader, slowly but surely corrupted the station. During the restoration of the magnificent statue of the God-Emperor, his craftsmen introduced faults in the structure that were invisible to the naked eye. Yet, years later, Astropaths noticed that the light of the Astronomican was greatly dimmed around Footfall.

languages.text: 托卡拉总督向行商浪人秘密宣誓效忠，以缓慢而确凿无疑的手段腐化了这座星站。当他命令修复宏伟的神皇雕像时，他的工匠刻意在结构上动了肉眼无法看见的手脚。很多年后，星语者们注意到，落脚港周围的星炬之光黯淡了许多。
languages.original_text: Liege Tocara, under a secret oath of loyalty to the Rogue Trader, slowly but surely corrupted the station. During the restoration of the magnificent statue of the God-Emperor, his craftsmen introduced faults in the structure that were invisible to the naked eye. Yet, years later, Astropaths noticed that the light of the Astronomican was greatly dimmed around Footfall.

traits.locale_text: 弗拉迪姆总督向行商浪人秘密宣誓效忠，以缓慢而确凿无疑的手段腐化了这座星站。当他命令修复宏伟的神皇雕像时，他的工匠刻意在结构上动了肉眼无法看见的手脚。很多年后，星语者们注意到，落脚港周围的星炬之光黯淡了许多。

languages.text: Lehnsherr Tocara, der {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} einen geheimen Treueeid geschworen hatte, korrumpierte die Station langsam, aber sicher. Während der Restoration der wunderbaren Statue des Gottimperators bauten seine Handwerker Fehler an dem Kunstwerk ein, die für das nackte Auge unsichtbar waren. Aber Jahre später bemerkten Astropathen, dass das Licht des Astronomican rund um Footfall deutlich geschwächt war.
languages.original_text: Liege Tocara, under a secret oath of loyalty to the Rogue Trader, slowly but surely corrupted the station. During the restoration of the magnificent statue of the God-Emperor, his craftsmen introduced faults in the structure that were invisible to the naked eye. Yet, years later, Astropaths noticed that the light of the Astronomican was greatly dimmed around Footfall.

traits.locale_text: Lehnsherr Vladaym, der {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} einen geheimen Treueeid geschworen hatte, korrumpierte die Station langsam, aber sicher. Während der Restoration der wunderbaren Statue des Gottimperators verdeckten seine Handwerker Fehler an dem Gebilde, so dass sie für das nackte Auge unsichtbar wurden. Aber Jahre später bemerkten Astropathen, dass das Licht des Astronomican rund um Footfall deutlich geschwächt war.

languages.text: Le suzerain Tocara, honorant un serment prêté en secret {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}, sema progressivement la corruption dans toute la station. Durant la restauration de la majestueuse statue de l'Empereur-Dieu, ses artisans introduisirent des malfaçons invisibles à l'œil nu. Des années plus tard, les astropathes remarquèrent que l'éclat de l'Astronomican avait fortement diminué autour de Castel.
languages.original_text: Liege Tocara, under a secret oath of loyalty to the Rogue Trader, slowly but surely corrupted the station. During the restoration of the magnificent statue of the God-Emperor, his craftsmen introduced faults in the structure that were invisible to the naked eye. Yet, years later, Astropaths noticed that the light of the Astronomican was greatly dimmed around Footfall.

traits.locale_text: Le suzerain Vladaym, honorant un serment prêté en secret {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}, sema progressivement la corruption dans toute la station. Durant la restauration de la majestueuse statue de l'Empereur-Dieu, ses artisans introduisirent des malfaçons invisibles à l'œil nu. Des années plus tard, les astropathes remarquèrent que l'éclat de l'Astronomican avait fortement diminué autour de Castel.

languages.text: El Señor Tocara, bajo un juramento secreto de lealtad a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, corrompió la estación con paso lento pero seguro. Durante la restauración de la magnífica estatua del Dios Emperador, sus artesanos crearon fallos indetectables a simple vista en la estructura. Aun así, años después, los Astrópatas se percataron de que la luz del Astronomicón estaba muy apagada alrededor de Paso.
languages.original_text: Liege Tocara, under a secret oath of loyalty to the Rogue Trader, slowly but surely corrupted the station. During the restoration of the magnificent statue of the God-Emperor, his craftsmen introduced faults in the structure that were invisible to the naked eye. Yet, years later, Astropaths noticed that the light of the Astronomican was greatly dimmed around Footfall.

traits.locale_text: El Señor Vladaym, bajo un juramento secreto de lealtad a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, corrompió la estación con paso lento pero seguro. Durante la restauración de la magnífica estatua del Dios Emperador, sus artesanos crearon fallos indetectables a simple vista en la estructura. Aun así, años después, los astrópatas se percataron de que la luz del Astronomicón estaba muy apagada alrededor de Paso.

languages.text: 自由開拓者への密かな忠誠の誓いのもと、領主トカラはゆっくりと、しかし確実にステーションを腐敗させていった。神帝陛下の壮麗な彫像を修復する際、彼の職人たちは肉眼では見えない欠陥を入れてしまった。しかし数年後、感応通信官たちはフットフォール周辺で星辰波の光が大きく減衰していることに気づいた。
languages.original_text: Liege Tocara, under a secret oath of loyalty to the Rogue Trader, slowly but surely corrupted the station. During the restoration of the magnificent statue of the God-Emperor, his craftsmen introduced faults in the structure that were invisible to the naked eye. Yet, years later, Astropaths noticed that the light of the Astronomican was greatly dimmed around Footfall.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者への密かな忠誠の誓いのもと、領主トカラはゆっくりと、しかし確実にステーションを腐敗させていった。神帝陛下の壮麗な彫像を修復する際、彼の職人たちは肉眼では見えない欠陥を入れてしまった。しかし数年後、感応通信官たちはフットフォール周辺で星辰波の光が大きく減衰していることに気づいた。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'e gizlice sadakat yemini eden Emîr Tocara, istasyonu yavaş yavaş yozlaştırdı. İşçileri, Tanrı İmparator'un görkemli heykelinin onarımı sırasında çıplak gözle görülemeyecek yapısal sorunlar olduğunu tespit etti. Yıllar sonra Astropatlar, Astronomikan'ın ışığının Binliman çevresinde önemli ölçüde azaldığını fark edecekti.
languages.original_text: Liege Tocara, under a secret oath of loyalty to the Rogue Trader, slowly but surely corrupted the station. During the restoration of the magnificent statue of the God-Emperor, his craftsmen introduced faults in the structure that were invisible to the naked eye. Yet, years later, Astropaths noticed that the light of the Astronomican was greatly dimmed around Footfall.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'e gizlice sadakat yemini etmiş olan Emîr Tocara, istasyonu yavaş yavaş yozlaştırdı. İşçileri, Tanrı İmparator'un görkemli heykelinin onarımı sırasında çıplak gözle görülemeyecek yapısal sorunlar olduğunu tespit etti. Yıllar sonra Astropatlar, Astronomikan'ın ışığının Binliman çevresinde önemli ölçüde azaldığını fark edecekti.
